title: Spider-Man Homecoming: Get a good look at Robert Downey Jr’s new Iron Man suit | hollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Spider-Man Homecoming: Get a good look at Robert Downey Jr’s new Iron Man suit 
Spider-Man: Homecoming is still a few months away, but new images of the central characters’ (Peter Parker, Iron Man, The Vulture) different costumes from the Marvel superhero movie will totally get you excited. hollywood Updated: Feb 09, 2017 17:40 IST HT Correspondent Hindustan Times Spider-Man:Homecoming is scheduled for a July 7 release. It will also feature Iron Man in a supporting role. 
Spider-Man: Homecoming may be a while away, but new images of Spidey’s new costume(s), Iron Man new suit, The Vulture will totally get you excited. 
The new pictures come from Hasbro’s line of Marvel action figures and feature Spider-Man’s various costumes from the film - from a DIY tracksuit, to the fancy one with wings he is given by Tony Stark. 
Check out the images here: 
Interestingly, the film will also feature a new Iron Man costume. Granted, Iron Man gets a new suit for every movie, but this one looks like nothing we have seen before. 
Here it is: 
Spider-Man: Homecoming is directed by Jon Watts for a July 7 release. 
The film will mark a ‘homecoming’ for one of Marvel’s most popular characters in the massive Marvel Cinematic Universe (the rights to the character were previously held by Sony). 
It stars Tom Holland as the friendly neighbourhood web-slinger and Marisa Tomei as his Aunt May. Also starring are Michael Keaton as Vulture and Robert Downey Jr as Iron Man. 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
